summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley east of Block 5, Belvoir Addition, and west of Block 9, Belvoir Addition, and west of Block 7, Laurelhurst Addition, being the alley from East 37th Street to East 41st Street, between 41st Avenue Northeast and 42nd Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 117795 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
